column5: My house is less than a mile from Scott and White Medical Center and less than two from McLane Children's. Quiet neighborhood and a beautiful backyard. Perfect for rotating students! A (well behaved) cat and dog live here as well.  Please note, the bed in this room is a Full sized bed, not a Queen. It's very roomy for one person, but a little bit of a squeeze for two!
column8: Cozy Bedroom with Private Bath near Hospital
